name: StateScreen
description: Component that shows a full screen for a certain state, like an empty state

props.name: imageSource
props.description: The image source that's showing at the top. use an image that was required locally

props.name: title
props.description: To to show as the title

props.name: ctaLabel
props.description: Text to to show in the CTA button

props.name: testID
props.description: Use to identify the container in tests
